div.a: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1677 Egypt, c. 1904-1908 ? Burial: c. 285 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 458+ AR Ptolemy I: tetradr. Disposition: unknown Svoronos, Ptolemies 4, pp. 404-7, nos. 183-268 (listed as "Egyptian find") Possibly part of the Abu Hommos 1905 hoard (cf. no. 1726 below)
